name: VAPOR TANKS
description:
Explore Cyberspace in VAPOR TANKS, an arcade 3D shooter with a focus on satisfying gameplay, addictive replayability, and surrealist visuals.

- A full 30+ level long single-player campaign featuring a variety of enemies, power ups to use to your advantage, and a High Scores to be set.
-Journey through 8 zones with unique themes and aesthetics each, along with new mechanics and enemies to fight
-A new Boss Fight every other zone to conquer
-4 Different Single Player modes to conquer and test your skills in combat, speed, and agility
-12 Vaporwave OST composed by Peter Roberts
